action_output_list: To start, I need to open the Retro Music app.{"action_type": "open_app", "app_name": "Retro Music"}

The current screen shows the playlists. To enable the 'Whitelist music' feature, I need to navigate to the settings. I can try to open the settings by clicking the "More options" button.{"action_type": "click", "index": 14}

The current screen shows the options after clicking the "More options" button. The goal is to enable the 'Whitelist music' feature. To do this, I need to go to the settings screen. The "Settings" option is available on the current screen.{"action_type": "click", "index": 24}
